detail_desc: Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit joggers in soft cashmere with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves with open sections and decorative plastic beads.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and press-studs at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and a seam at the waist with pleats at the top and a flared skirt with zips in the sides. Lined front.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit, patterned cotton with a sewn-on bow at the neckline and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Poncho in a soft weave with a fringed hem. Size 100x136 cm.
Suede slippers with pile linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Shopper in transparent plastic with two round imitation leather handles at the top. Size 9.5x26x29.5 cm.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, fake front pockets, real back pockets, a fake fly and slightly wider, tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Microfibre nursing top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with moulded, padded cups, a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless maxi dress in crinkled viscose with inset lace sections, crocheted lace shoulder straps and a seam with flounces at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a text print at the back and an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets and one back pocket, all with a concealed zip, and a ventilated mesh section at the crotch. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Set with a bodysuit and pair of leggings in printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist.
Jacket in soft faux fur with unlined sleeves, jersey-lined front and back and no fasteners.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in patterned cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped sports top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric made from fast-drying functional fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.

Set with a dress in an organic cotton weave and pair of tights in a knitted cotton blend with the cotton content being organic. Dress with buttons on the shoulders and a seam with pleats at the top. Tights with an elasticated waist and jacquard-knit feet.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
V-neck top in soft jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with buttons down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Double-breasted coat in a woven cotton blend with wide notch lapels, a decorative button hole and an off-centre zip and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and press-stud, and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V neck with lacing at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft cotton jersey with textured stripes. Fake jetted pocket with a button at the top and a fabric appliqué above the hem. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long sleeves with a sewn-in turn-up at the cuffs.

Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Satin lining.
Sun hat in woven fabric with a decorative bow. Cotton lining. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with an interactive motif on the front. Bag with a sequined motif and embroidery on the front. Hook and loop fastening at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a hook and loop fastening at one end.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Sleeveless dress in patterned jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest top in stretch jersey made from recycled polyester with deep armholes, cut-out sections at the sides and an elasticated hem.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof, functional fabric with imitation leather details and an ankle-height shaft with an elastic drawstring at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short parka in washed cotton twill with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and press-studs at the cuffs. Zipped side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Cargo shorts in a linen and cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in heavy jersey with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long raglan sleeves, diagonal welt side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and chest pocket.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons at the front, a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Back in a glossy weave with an adjustable tab. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, ribbed bands, patch front pockets and a ribbed hem. No fasteners.
Jacquard-weave tie with a Christmas motif. Width 6.5 cm.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Dressing gown in soft pile with a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Blouse in an airy patterned viscose weave with a round neck, buttons down the back and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim at the top, sleeve-ends and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Short dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and short slits in the sides.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton seersucker with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with a contrasting colour inside. Small embroidered detail on the chest, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Hat in felted wool. Width of brim 9.5 cm.

Shirt in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim. Relaxed fit with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.

Set with a top, pair of puff pants and a hairband in soft cotton jersey. A-line, patterned top. Patterned puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems. Double-layered hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Lace dress with a pleated skirt, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a slim fit at the top. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket and straight legs with drawstring hems.
Soft slippers with appliqués and embroidery. Pile linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles with anti-slip protection.
